data.description: Elementary theory and practical work in phonetics, phonology, morphology, and syntax, with attention to formal grammar.
data.title: INTRODUCTION TO LINGUISTICS: DESCRIPTIVE AND THEORETICAL

data.description: Elementary theory and practical work in phonetics, phonology, morphology, and syntax, with attention to formal grammar.
data.title: HUMAN LANGUAGE

data.description: Introduction and overview of the linguistics of sign languages, signing communities, and perceptions of deaf people and sign languages. Topics include: the grammar of sign languages, their use in signing communities, patterns in the transmission and acquisition of sign languages, and the emergence of new sign languages.
data.title: SIGN LANGUAGE LINGUISTICS
